ygData.subject: Advice needed for Monk Character
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All, I have a 5th level monk in freeport on fennin ro. I decided early on to use dual hammers as weapons this seems to work out well my stats are ( Or
ygData.messageBody:
Hello All,

I have a 5th level monk in freeport on fennin ro. I
decided early on to use dual hammers as weapons this
seems to work out well my stats are ( Or close to) DW
38 OF 27 Def 28 HTH 12 Kick 17. So here are my
questions. One should I give up on the Hammers and
just use my fists ( They seem to do simular damage I
just like the Hammers) Or should I keep using the
hammers or switch to another weapon. Also I have been
looking for hammers better than rusty but cant find
any to purchase and dont know where to look. I have
asked around but to no avail. One more question, where
near freeport should I be adventuring to find better
stuff. I have tried the bandits but they kill me quick
and whoever I am with. The Fire Bugs and Armidillas
are the only mobs that still give exp. Every once in a
while I can take out a puma or jackal when I can find
them. I am a half a bubble away from 6 so my guess is
that the Fire Bugs and armmildillas wont be providing
exp much longer. Also has anyone ever looted anything
from an armidilla? Well any other words of advice
would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks
